short_summary: DND wants to buy REDCOM Sigma XRI-400 devices and accessories.
description: DND wants to establish a ROIP connection to its Link 16 radios in order to support the RCAF interim Link 16 ground entry station J-voice capability to a remotely operated function. The requirement will support voice communications over Link 16 for operators who are not in immediate vicinity of the radios. This initiative allows command and control over J-voice for operators in multiple locations and provides higher headquarters the ability to monitor. To acquire this capability, DND is procuring quantity of 5 REDCOM XRI-400 devices including accessories, software, support plan and training.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** REDCOM Sigma XRI-400 Devices and Accessories

**Reference Number:** CB-866-96005712

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-258182/A

**Publication Date:** June 11, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** June 26, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites suppliers to express interest in providing REDCOM Sigma XRI-400 devices and accessories to support the Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) Link 16 ground entry station J-voice capability.

**Request for Statement of Capabilities**

The DND seeks statements of capabilities from qualified suppliers to provide the required equipment, including:

* 5 x REDCOM Sigma XRI-400 systems
* Accessories, software, support plan, and training

**Key Requirements**

* Establish a Radio over Internet Protocol (ROIP) connection to Link 16 radios
* Support voice communications over Link 16 for operators in multiple locations
* Provide higher headquarters with the ability to monitor

**Eligibility**

* Suppliers must be able to provide the required equipment, including software and support
* Suppliers must have experience providing similar equipment to Canadian government agencies

**Submission Guidelines**

* Suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities, including a description of their proposed solution and any relevant experience or qualifications
* Statements of capabilities must be submitted by June 26, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EDT

**Contact Information**

* Procurement Officer: Linda Voyer
* Email: [linda.voyer@forces.gc.ca](mailto:linda.voyer@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-0819

**Document Download**

The tender notice and relevant documents can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

### Important Notes

* This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), and the DND intends to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier
* If no supplier submits a statement of capabilities that meets the requirements, the DND may proceed with awarding the contract to the pre-identified supplier
* The DND reserves the right to cancel or modify the procurement at any time
